data.message: My wife was trying to reset her password and it keeps sending same.code but not accepting code says invalid

replies.message: Hey Joe. We're sorry to hear your wife is having trouble. For troubleshooting tips, visit: on.fb.me/1ysufS2. If you are still experiencing the problem, please report this issue to us by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2zDVeSX. -Kiara
Won't work still the code yall keep sending keeps saying invalid for her account
Still wont work! Keeps sending the same code that says invalid!,

We hear your frustration, Joe. Thanks for reaching out. She may be able to back into her Facebook account by answering security questions or getting help from friends. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2hVV92S. -Brittany
please help me verify my account someone trying to report my account please please facebook help center
Oyea same as me, n what the code mean?
